product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: We'll facilitate the installation and demo through authorized service engineer at your convenience The installation will be done within 48 hours of delivery of the TV. The service engineer will install your new TV, either on wall mount or on table top. The wall mount is not included in the box and will be chargeable. The engineer will also help you understand your new TV's features. The process generally covers: Wall-mounted or table-top installation, as requested. Physical check of all ports, including power and USB ports. Accessories also checked. Demonstration of features and settings Quick run-through on how to operate the TV.

product_description.AI Picture Engine: The TCL AI Picture Engine feature intelligently recognises scenes of the movie you’re watching through an AI algorithm. This helps improve the brightness, contrast, and saturation of the pictures so that you can view more details and enjoy a realistic and vivid viewing experience.
product_description.AI Scene Picture Enhancement Technology: You can enjoy a depth of field effect while watching content on this TV as the parameters of each scene is adjusted.

review:
Excellent LED TV. purchased it on 17/10/19 evening, got it delivered on next day at 10 am, just after one hour rec'd a call for installation, based on my convenience one Mr. Vishwanth Reddy visited our home at 3.00 pm. He is an excellent installation engineer, finished his work very neat and fast, explained the functionalities of the TV too. first of all a big five star for the delivery of Flipkart and the excellent service of Jeeves the service partner.

About TV, now I used it for 3 days, I can say it is par with any other branded TV's, I am using a Samsung TV at home, definitely I can compare it with the same. video upscaling is very good, hd contents looks super, 4k videos are just like live vision, black background is pure black, may be the direct lighting a+ panel helps it. color reproduction is excellent. Sound is pretty good, but I use a home theatre connected through the SPDIF port. Dolby clarity is amazing. Overall I am very happy with the product.

I have Purchased 50" model on 1st June 2020 and it has delivered to me on 4th June with installation same day.
Truly speaking after one week, if you are looking for a budget smart TV then this is Fabulous TV. Picture quality, sound, Wi-Fi connectivity is truly awesome. I also took help of Flipkart reviews before ordering TV but yes now I totally believe on Flipkart and TV brand TCL iFFalcon...
Only one note- If you do not have HD channel set top box then please get it to feel the masterpiece experience... Normal channel other than HD also run smoothly but the effect and experience of HD is ultimate.

Update after 20 months: TV is great. it lacks nothing. working fine.
This TV is great so far. It's been 10 days since installation. PQ is great. 4k is brilliant. 1080p is also very good. sd is bad, but nowadays except for some news channels nothing is in sd. SQ is also good considering that these kind of slim TVs can't have better speakers. 4k on YouTube, Netflix etc works perfectly on my wifi. all the apps are working perfectly. never once did I have to restart my tv or any app . voice commands are good. bluetooth connectivity is good . Prime Video is downloadable from official Play Store.
cons : cricket is unwatchable due to image shaking while camera is panning. all other sports are ok. even football is good. watching sd content is bad. it being a VA panel, colors start to wash out as viewing angle increases. not a problem if you watch tv sitting directly in front of it.
bought at 28k during bbd sale.

wow...great deal 😍
writing review after 1 month use
good in picture quality
very good in sound system
it supports hotstar, amazon prime, zee5, amazon Alexa, we can download extra app&games from playstore.....

200% iffalcon by tcl 4k android tv is better then mi 4k android tv's
just go for it guys... 👏👏

The TV is fab! The best in this price and more for this price actually. You can definitely buy it. No issues at all. Connectivity is so good. Clarity is great and True UHD 4K. Sound quality is also very clear.

MY INITIAL IMPRESSION

Purchase date: 28/9/2019(BB Day)
Delivered on: 10/10/2019
Instalation date: 13/10/2019
Model No :43K31

Picture quality: Good picture quality but recommend to play atleast 720p content. SD SET TOP Box picture is below average which is usual. Don't do much experiment with picture settings , keep default settings out of the box. Viewing angles are good.

Sound quality: Excellent sound output from the two speakers. No need of additional spekar to connect. For Dolby Audio you must play supported content. Please choose Dynamic in the sound settings.

Connectivity: I don't have any issues with chrome casting. USB port is version 2.O , so a bit slow for external hard disk. I don't have HDMI /SPDIF Devices, so no comments on that .Bluetooth TV Remote is quite compact, light weight & responsive but u need some days to get used to this.

Android tv interface: On early usages it is a bit slow but after 6 hrs of usages it becomes more responsive.

Instalation: I will recommend you to install in wall because TV is light & with stand a bit shaky. Keep atleast 6 ft. distance between you & TV for better viewing.

I think for price to performance ratio this TV fits strongly as compared to its rivalries. I will post my full depth review after one month of usages.

This is the best one can ask for the price you pay. Stunning display. Beautiful colors. 4k videos are treat to your eyes, color reproduction is amazing. Brightness could have been little more but is manageable. I have not tried sd content but full hd is of good quality. Overall value for money.

Excellent Purchase in this Big Billion Day !
Received the TV in 15 hrs after Order and installation by the Jeeves team on the same day. Kudos to Flipkart for that.
TV is exceptionally beautiful for it's price tag ,got 55" for 24,100 after various discounts..
Display is good though it isn't great as the big brand TVs , Dolby sound with my 4.1 speakers is amazing, connecting the TV with WiFi, app setup were all done with ease.
HD & SD channel quality is satisfactory , it's advisable to sit from a distance for pleasant viewing.
I don't know why this TV isn't getting desired attention that it deserves in the YouTube reviews. YouTubers are extremely biased for the new Motorola TV and VU premium Android.
This TV costs 8k lesser than VU premium Android TV. only Con is the 270 nits brightness as against 450 nits of VU. But in closer room that hardly matters. Also Dolby Vision in VU is a joke considering it's lack of minimum requirements for Dolby Vision.
Pros of Iffalcon over VU are latest Android, Connectivity easeness , fast boot up time, better sound. Note both the TVs have same resale value.
Note : It's advisable to buy additional 2 yrs of full warranty protection with Jeeves ( Purchase with the Installation guy, he offers it for RS.1930) . anything related to TV malfunctioning will be taken care of for free of cost.

Pros: Great value for money, great features, latest Android Official TV OS, Ample connectivity options, official streaming Apps. Cons: viewing angles are not that great. colors and contrast appear washed out from about 130 degrees side viewing. Slow boot up. No full function remote provided, just one voice remote with minimal set of buttons. The 65" TV from Iffalcon (2018) is my other TV where the above listed Cons are not applicable. that TV is a great product overall compared to this 55". if you can afford that and have a larger room for 64" TV then go for that instead. after sales support, I installation everything just fine. no issues.

I think this tv is the best under 25k. sharp picture quality, smooth Android experience.

It sometimes feels laggy i.e after quite long usage (I don't turn off for usually 4-5 days and keep a lot of apps open). However, it gets back to normal after a restart.

I couldn't be happier I returned Kotak's so called 4k ( not 4K ) tv for this Stunner. I absolutely have nothing to complain about Picture quality : Crystal Clear , Sound : Dolby Atmos, perfect . Android : Latest and super smooth . I had doubts about Brightness but it didn't disappoint at all, It's Sufficient enough. Bought this for 23250 Rupees and it's worth every penny. Don't hesitate, go for it. You won't regret it

Update ! Prime Video works on this device now !

After using it for more than a month (8 to 12 hrs per day)
* Picture quality is excellent at this price. I encountered no restart issues till date as it was mentioned in various review which made me had second thoughts for going for this product. I faced no such issues.
* Sound quality is awesome it really rocked my room with crystal clear audio.
* Connectivity with WiFi and hotspots very fast and smooth with no hastle whatsoever. Initially I was worried that at such price tag will I get good software and hardware combo. But again I was surprised in this department also.
* In built app like Netflix and other work like charm and give theatre like feeling in my bedroom. very satisfied
* Casting is very easy with apps like hotstar, voot, MX player, zee5, YouTube and so on. But you have to give up on clarity wich I personally belived was not fault of TV, but fault off app as well as internet speed. I must mention hear that I am strictly using my mobile data to watch all the content.
I can only imagine what the picture quality will be when used with broadband.
* Remote is ergonomically well designed, with OK button slightly mounted high gives idea of relative other buttons
* Overall great experience till date. Every feature mentioned for the product works well. I have give one star less for picture quality, but guys let's face this, one cannot compare this product with likes of Sony, LG and Samsung. At this price point it is definitely a buy and worth every Paisa.

I bought this for 26.5k on sale.I think this is value for money for 55 inch android TV.
Writing this review after couple of months of usage.
This is a VA panel with 270 nits brightness.
270 nits brightness is in the lower side.
Because VA panel it will not give colors accuracy like IPS panel.But it is DLED compared to edge led which most of the IPS panel TVs are so that is a plus.

I am using this TV for last 3 months. Here are some pros and cons based on the last 3 months of usage.

Pros:
1. 4K videos are a treat to watch on this TV.
2. No connectivity issue.
3. Sound will take you by surprise. It's incredibly loud and clear.
4. I use it to play games on XBox. So far, I didn't face any issues related to connectivity with controller. Only that if you want to enjoy games in 4K, you need to plug HDMI cable in Hdmi 1 port and not Hdmi 2.

Cons:
1. I have seen a horizontal line at the top of the screen 2-3 times. Although it went away on restarting the TV.
2. TV display settings simply do not work. I can't adjust the brightness properly. Although for games, I can adjust the view using XBox display settings.

If you are looking for a budget 43" 4k TV, I strongly recommend this TV.
Review after three days of usage.
1. Awesome picture quality comapred to products in 20-25k segment. Pictures are sharp. No aliasing after 1.5ft away from the TV. (5/5)
2. Audio is good. Not too high bass and treble but equalised. (4/5)
3. Not just for this TV but most of the Android TVs, it feels like the UI is not optimized for best UX. There is a bug where I'm not able to navigate to my apps in PlayStore. However, you rarely come to this point.(3.75/5)
4. Tried screen casting with native app as well as other screen casting apps available on PlayStore but it didn't connect at all. But media on phone can be casted easily. (2.5/5)
5. Screen casting with laptop (tested with Ubuntu) is very fast. It feels little slow when you are casting 4k videos but otherwise flawless. (4/5)
6. Wifi connectivity and Bluettoth connectivity are super fast. (5/5)
7. You can view good quality picture through 170°.
8. I bought this on Republic day, delivered the next day and installed the subsequent day.
9. Overall rating - 4.25/5

After 3 months of extreme usage:

1. I still feel the same picture quality. That is very good.
2. I personally felt that and external audio source is required for a bteer or home theater experience.
3. Got used to the not-so-optimized Android TV UI. So it's not a much of problem. Controls for seeking the movie especially with Amazon Prime sucks.
4. I still couldn't find an app better that Google Chromecast for screen casting. However, the casting is very slow.
5. Screen casting with laptop still holds the same impression.
6. WiFi connectivity is the place where I've faced severe problem. During these 3 months I have to reset the TV to factory setting for 4 times for connecting to WiFi. It just shows unable to connect to WiFi. When you try to comnect it again by forget network, it's not going to work. All you have to do is resetting the TV. I missed my personalized apps and need to start as a brand new product. Signin after reset, cutomizing apps again and installing the apps is a hectic task. There should be some update to correct this. This is the place where you can make a choice before buying.
7. Still impressed with the viewing angle.

New points of note:
1. The remote is very powerful. I have used it for a rouge test and found it very much fine.
2. If you have a home theater attached to the TV, you will really have a theater experience, preferably wireless.
3. Really worth the price you put and assured uality in your experience when compared to that of othe TVs in the same budget range.
4. Booting takes time around 52 seconds!

Detailed review of the product as on 17 jan 2020
I bought this TV 10 days back since then i'm testing and experiencing the TV features.
I would like to to divide the TV review and features into small segments.

Display: It's 4k TV so the picture is of very good quality. I have tested it with youtube 4k video. Even the 720p videos are also very much clear.

Sound : It's perfect. clean and neat.

Build Quality: It's made up of standard quality plastic.

Connectivity: It has plenty of hdmi and usb ports, bluetooth connection works very smoothly and wifi also works very smoothly we need fast internet connectivity that's it.

User Interface: The interface is clean and very smooth but the first time loading is bit slow after that it is very smooth and fast.

wallmount : wall mount is inside the box & it is small and installation is free of cost.

Please also take protection plan which costs you around 3k for 3 years service for the safety of your TV.

I have purchased 43" Tv and using it since a month. I have no issues with it so far as I am loving its picture quality and sound. Its remote is good and very responsive. Please do purchase voltage stabilizer with it as without stabilizer company may not cover all warrenties as I have heared from installation Man.

Pros

1.)Good Viewing angle(8ft distance needed)
2.)out of the box Android 9
3.)2gb 16gb storage (where else another tv only gives 8gb storage.)
4.) Wi-Fi 2.4ghz than (good in receiving signals), (but mi tv give 5ghz)
5.)4k hdr 10, Dolby audio perfectly working,fhd,hd is also good. (whatever resolution play its scaled to fullscreen)
6.)when you wall mount the tv all connections(HDMI, USB, cable, digital out) are side-mounted which is useful.
7.)Internal Tv Sound is good(total 100 steps 50-60 enough)(dual 20-watt speaker),
8.) Bluetooth available, Bluetooth remote included. Chromecast built-in.
9.)Alexa compatible.

Cons

1.)medium bezel(build quality good)
2.)sd(480p) is average not so good.
3.)Amazon prime only sideload (till 1080p, hdr not working in prime)
4.)update level is on July security patch only, till Dec 6 there is no update available.
5.)there is a lot of bloatware like Netflix, erosnow,t channel, Google play videos, play music.tv doesn't give permission to uninstall it
6.) The service center is less available.

Key highlights after using for two weeks:
1) Terrible Brightness, low even at 100% and flickers in some dark scenes with aggresive switching to low brightness even when settings have been adjusted to not do so.
2) Horrible Viewing angles. Move to anywhere other than sitting straight in front of the screen and the colors will change to highly inaccurate level and you'll lose all the details.
3) Connectivity issues marring YouTube app that every other the app tells me to sign in which can only be resolved after a reboot.
4) Speakers are Top-notch and very loud. Lovely experience even at low volume levels, Bass is pretty good. Dialogue can be heard crisp and clear. very satisfied with audio output.
5) Build quality is fantastic and the TV set is quite light.

Received the tv yesterday. Brought the 43inch model for 19999, exchanged my old crt tv and got 2400 for it!! Installation was done today nd 1 thing to clarify here is, yes the light bleeding issue is real and you cannot avoid it with this TV. But imo it isn't a issue cause that's how dleds behave and you are getting best picture when you need it anyways. But you won't notice it while watching movies etc. You will get all the colors you want. Just some places like YouTube loading screen etc. Where grey screen is displayed, you'll notice it. But for me Personally, this isn't an issue at all. The tv isn't fastest, but also not on the annoying side when it comes to performance. This tv is actually the best option better than mi and flipkart's offering. If you're afraid of light bleeding then go for marq, but I'd suggest you to stay away form mi tv due to their pathetic after sales service. What I'd suggest is to get the extended warranty by flipkart. If you were unable to avail it, get it from jeeves by paying 1500 for for 2 years cover. If you found the info helpful vote up so other people can see this review and get their doubts clarified. Have a good day.

6) simple to operate

8) remote cells last over an year .
9) no deterioration of the remote buttons .
10) remote is very sturdy ..
Fallen 50+ times ..
But works as it is ....too good

Cons
1) the wall mounting plate bends over time ..around 5 degrees in 2 years .
2) white lines and belts appear momentarily on the black screen when you switch off the TV from remote
3) slight discolouration when putting off ..oy on black colours ..but not when viewing .
4) extremely delicate and small foot stand ..
The tv can not be supported well by the feet ..
Will fall even when fan is pit on full..

Has to be wall mounted ..

Overall
Extremely happy ... .

The TV is Amazing in this Price!
Pros and Cons are here after 1month of usage!

Pros --
1. Picture quality is great! I played Netflix 4K videos and works like charm! One thing, keep the TV display settings to Smart HDR and you are good!
2. Being a 20W speaker, sound is much of a theatre like experience! It supports Dolby Atmos! I never went above 40 coz I never needed to! Played some songs in 100 for just testing and sound is crisp and very loud! No distortion nothing! Just clear sound!
3. Played 4K videos downloaded them! I just played an 80gb movie via my HDD directly and VLC lagged a bit! But TV's Default player played it like a breeze! No struggle and picture quality is very good and crisp clear!
4. It's also got micro dimming! In darker scenes the brightness of picture gets lower and content clearity increases!
5. Power input is very less! 25W-30W per hour!
6. Remote is very sensitive! The batteries are provided inside the box! TCL original batteries! Its working really well! No china 3rd class rubbish products overall! Just original and decent! Even the batteries! Great work their!
7. Pen drives, HDD, Mouse, Keyboard, everything works like a Breeze!
8. Ram is 2GB! Played asphalt 8 works really good! U have to use a gamepad! For some reason a wired gamepad doesn't work that good but atleast it works! Out of 16gb 11gb is available for use!
9. Played via PS4 pro on it! Setting have to kept in Dynamic because the brightness gets reduced every now and then in Smart HDR! Switching tv to dynamic switches of Micro dimming! Also it has LED motion control which shows speedy objects very clear! Supports 4K gaming also!
10. It has HDMI Arc! And I connected it to my laptop and it supports 4K gaming via laptop too! Max Refresh rate is 60hz!
11. Its an Indian product! So wall mount is their in the box! It's not Mi or OnePlus!
12. No backlight bleeding!
13. Wifi speed and connectivity is good! Considering it only has single wifi band 2.4ghz, it's very good in connectivity! Connects very fast! And speed is also good!
14. Packaging is good!
15. Get a mouse(wireless would be best) and install Jio TV apk direct from any site! It's widely available! And no need for set top box! I use it via Jio TV only! Works great!

Cons --
1. Plastic all over! It's very light and shaky! Stands are also made of plastic atleast they should have atleast provided a metal stand! Plastic built is acceptable in this price but metal stands could have been provided!
2. Doesn't supports Dolby Vision! No Wide color gamut! But acceptable as its price is much lower!
3. Chromecast is a little laggy! 0.7s lag! Both via laptop and phone!
4. USB 2.0 ports! No 3.0! Feels a bit slow! Only 2 ports!
5. Touching the screen creates distortion in the picture! This shows build quality is not that great! I have a Bravia 43inch and it has alot better quality! But I've seen motorolla and mi TV's! They are costlier than this TV but still equivalent in terms of built quality!


Verdict is that this TV is the best at this price! Even better than motorolla TVs and mi! As they have screen bleeding issues but this one hasn't! I bought it for personal use as I have 2 TVs already! Bravia and LG! But this one is best value for money!

An all rounder TV with few pesky things. Bit for the Price I got 20.5K it is complete VFM.

Good things:
- Brilliant Color Display
- Good Network Reception
- Good RAM management. Its been 4 months now am using it, no such lag ever encountered. And I have over 25 apps installed in it to give idea.
- Clean UI, as it uses stock android. There is also another option to use TCLs own UI, but I prefer Android over that
- Good upscaling. Sd channels are upscale by a good range

Not so good things:
- Mediocre sound reproduction. To be honest it is not that bad, but lows are not clear with whatever sound settings I try. Voice Clarity is good if isolated from music
- Weak signal reception from remote. It may be one of cases but yes I am facing this.
- Few connectivity ports. The TV has only 2 HDMI ports and 1 USB port. So if you are looking for more connectivity options then this may not be right choice.

Not checked things
- Of course the Post sales service as I have not faced any problem yet. But I will recommend to go with extended warranty which has a added benefit of return value.
- Sound output via Peripherals. Have tried with Bluetooth devices and it was smooth. But still need to check with wired outputs like optical or Aux cable. Will update it soon.

Hope this helps.

Picture Quality: it's not comparable to LG or Sony TVs, however if you tweak the settings, you'll be able to produce some very high definition displays. The range of viewing angles is up to the mark. The AI enabled display feature is a cool thing to have, especially when you watch a huge variety of content. The picture quality being offered in this price range is impeccable.
Sound: The sound output is optimum, however the clarity is one thing I'm a little unsatisfied with. Also, the speaker placement and their throw direction is a little awkward. My TV is wall mounted. The other side of the wall receives better sound output than the TV's front.
Connectivity: There are certain connectivity issues I have faced since I bought the TV almost a year ago. If you set the 'Date and Time' to 'Manual' instead of 'Automatic', the Wi-Fi connection throws the 'no internet' and error. Trust me, I learnt this the hard way. Also, about 50% of the time, I don't see my TV's name when trying to cast my phone.
Overall: The iFFALCON offers amazing viewing experience with a few technical issues. But at such a price, it's the top stallion.

Iffalcon K31 4k UHD tv

Ordered the TV on 9th September 2020, Got delivered on 10th Sep and installation done on 11th Sep.

Got this tv for Rs :24849 under discount and exchange.

What else you want a 55 inch 4k smart led TV just for 25 thousand rupees..

In the box you get TV, Wall Mount Bracket, table top bracket and a remote control.
The quality of the wall mount bracket is not too strong and I don't think that it would take the load of the TV, was having a old bracket which was stronger and sturdy so installed the TV on that itself.

The remote is quite user friendly and has a dedicated button for Netflix.

The picture quality is awesome for this price range in fact it's much better than my previous videocon 4k led tv.
The sound is OK not that loud, but it's OK if you are using any home theater or sound bar's.
For connecting your sound bar's it has a dedicated optical audio output due to this the sound quality is crisp clear.
For connectivity it has 3 hdmi port's, 2 USB ports, aux port, and a LAN port.

On the whole the TV is a must Buy for this price range and would recommend it to other's as well.
Best smart tv in this price range. I recommend to all.

All good. The best deal. The default media player is fantastic. You can run 4k videos from pendrive if you want ( even my windows 10 media player lagged, running same video). The only con is the audio. It's good for music listener. But normal dialouges and low tones are not good, there is not enough bass in speakers. Thought they have bass enhancer, high definition mode in setting, but I don't find it very useful. In a movie if you're playing it in high volume for normal dialouges, it's become irritating when any music comes. The volume goes so high suddenly, and believe me it's frustrating to high and low the volume from remote again again.
There is nothing to complain about the 4k video panel. It's bright and colourful, the contrast is good. Although colours are over saturated, but I like it personally. Youtube, netflix, prime video all runs smoothly.

Sound is Loud I haven't gone beyond 50 in any scenario. Watching action movies and Horror movies is a delight
WiFi connectivity is seamless no troubles at all, Bluetooth remote is also functional and has a dedicated mute button, and input selection button, UI is smooth with very little niggles.
All apps working fine but Jio cinema app from Google Play and Aptoide both not working well TCl channel has integrated content but mostly paid.
The biggest and the worst problem is the company provided wall mount it can't hold the TV in place and it's very Fragile the locking system has flaws and you have a risk of felling TV always I have bought wall mount from the Jeeves guy which is same as my other Sharp TV.
All in all this TV has nothing extraordinary for the price just worth the money we pay.

Best TV in this price range (26k). Using it for last 12 days.
Pro: 1) Picture quality is awesome. Specially night and dark scenes.
2) Sound: Bass lovers might complain, otherwise nice.
3) Connectivity: Seamless casting and bluetooth connectivity.
4) Delivery intime by flipkart.
5) Remote: Light and small.
6) RAM 2 GB and Storage 16 GB: Ample space for apps.
Cons:
1) High motion scenes might strain eyes.
2) Air mouse needed: Should not complain in this price range.
3) Sound: 20 watt may feel a bit less.

Dont expect performance like costly Sony, LG, samsung etc. but in this price range this is killer. Just go for it if you have a tight budget.

One of the worst purchase of my life. TV is made with worst materials i feel. Purchased this tv back in august 2019. Initially everything was good. This year onwards tv started giving problem. Whenever there is any dark scenes tv was unable to lit up completely. Instead go dim and never come back to normal brighness just audio will be playing. Tv screen will be full black but if you dark your room you will be able to see that actually video is playing with brighness is not even visible for normal eyesight. This happened twice before it completely switched off one day. As it was on warranty Tcl service centre guy came and changed power circuit. After changing power circuit still had problem of tv going to dim when its gone to dark scenes. So again i complained to tcl service and again technician came and changed mother board. Still the issue has not resolved and technician now claiming its the issue with LED panel. I am actually regreting for buying this product as tcl has very bad service even i am from prime location still the tv repair is going on since may 4th and still not resolved. Please guys if you have 20k also never ever buy this product. This is definately made with cheap power circuit and led panel. Your product might even go bad within 2 years. I used VU tv for last 4 years and purchasing this was nightmare and tcl customer service not agreeing for replacement as well. PLEASE DONT DONT EVER BUY THIS PRODUCT. ITS CHEAP IN PRICE FOR A 4k TV BUT ITS MADE WITH CHEAP MATERIAL AS WELL. Wont long last.
